Hasbro announced that the Mr: Potato Head toy would be rebranded as the gender-neutral "Potato Head" and provided a link to an article explaining the change.
Hasbro clarified that the Mr: and Mrs. Potato Head toys would still be identified as Mr. and Mrs. on packaging, even though they would be part of the rebranded "Potato Heads" line.
The history of Mr: Potato Head as a toy distributed by Hasbro since 1952, with the introduction of Mrs. Potato Head the following year.
The intention behind the rebranding was: including same-sex or single-parent families. The rebranding also aimed to provide a blank slate for children to project their own ideas about gender, sexuality, and family onto the toy.
